June 17, 1995 D West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A)
West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Class A) 500 Test Piece Contest West of England Bandsmen's Festival (Bugle) west-of-england-bandsmen-s-festival-class-a
None
James Cook, Circumnavigator
Molinnis Park, Bugle, Cornwall, England, UK March (Grand March from "Aida" - Verdi arr Wright): 1. SWEB Camborne, 92 2. Bodmin, 91 3. Mount Charles, 90 4. St Dennis, 88
Best Player: Darren Hendy, cornet, SWEB Camborne
Best Soprano: Andrew Jay, Bodmin Best Solo Cornet: Darren Hendy, Camborne Best Euphonium: Steve Osborne, Bodmin Best Solo Horn: Graham Barker, Camborne Best Set of Basses: Camborne
A. R. Trudgian Youth Awards: Rebecca Yeo, Christopher Netherton
Deportment (judge Gareth Roberts): 1 Torrington Silver (Class C) 2 Bodmin
July 16, 2010, 11:18 p.m. Aug. 6, 2013, 2:41 p.m.
1 Camborne Town Band Derek Greenwood
2 Bodmin Town Band Howard Taylor
